languages.text: {n}Маражай прикрывает глаза и довольно хмыкает.{/n} "Как то и должно быть. Позаботься о том, чтобы мне доставало добычи — она имеет шанс начать заканчиваться слишком быстро".

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай прикрывает глаза и довольно хмыкает.{/n} "Как то и должно быть".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai closes his eyes for a moment and chuckles in satisfaction.{/n} "As it should be. See to it that I never have a shortage of prey — I tend to run out too quickly for my liking."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai ferme les yeux un bref instant et part d'un ricanement satisfait.{/n} « Il ne peut en être autrement. Veillez à ce que je ne manque jamais de proies, j'ai une fâcheuse tendance à épuiser mon cheptel trop rapidement. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai closes his eyes for a moment and chuckles in satisfaction.{/n} "As it should be. See to it that I never have a shortage of prey — I tend to run out too quickly for my liking."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai ferme les yeux un bref instant et part d'un ricanement satisfait.{/n} « Il ne peut en être autrement. Veillez à ce que je ne manque jamais de proies, j'ai une fâcheuse tendance à épuiser mon cheptel trop rapidement. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは一瞬目を閉じ、満足そうに笑った。{/n}「当然のことだ。獲物が不足することがないように気をつけるんだな。俺の場合、すぐに足りなくなくなっちまう傾向にあるんでね」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai closes his eyes for a moment and chuckles in satisfaction.{/n} "As it should be. See to it that I never have a shortage of prey — I tend to run out too quickly for my liking."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは一瞬目を閉じ、満足そうに笑った。{/n}「当然のことだ。獲物が不足することがないように気をつけるんだな。俺の場合、すぐに足りなくなくなっちまう傾向にあるんでね」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋闭上了眼睛，满意地笑了起来。{/n}“就应该是这样。记得确保有充足的猎物，否则我就要一直跑个不停，我可不喜欢这样。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai closes his eyes for a moment and chuckles in satisfaction.{/n} "As it should be. See to it that I never have a shortage of prey — I tend to run out too quickly for my liking."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋闭上了眼睛，满意地笑了起来。{/n}“就应该是这样。记得确保有充足的猎物，否则我就要一直跑个不停，我可不喜欢这样。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai schließt einen Augenblick lang die Augen und lacht zufrieden auf.{/n} "So gehört sich das. Sorgt dafür, dass es mir niemals an Beute mangelt — sie geht mir oft schneller aus, als es mir lieb ist."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai closes his eyes for a moment and chuckles in satisfaction.{/n} "As it should be. See to it that I never have a shortage of prey — I tend to run out too quickly for my liking."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai schließt einen Augenblick lang die Augen und lacht zufrieden auf.{/n} "So gehört sich das. Sorgt dafür, dass es mir niemals an Beute mangelt — sie geht mir oft schneller aus, als es mir lieb ist."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai cierra los ojos durante un instante y ríe satisfecho.{/n} «Como ha de ser. Procura que no me falten presas; suelen acabárseme demasiado pronto para mi gusto».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai closes his eyes for a moment and chuckles in satisfaction.{/n} "As it should be. See to it that I never have a shortage of prey — I tend to run out too quickly for my liking."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai cierra los ojos durante un instante y ríe satisfecho.{/n} «Como ha de ser. Procura que no me falten presas; suelen acabárseme demasiado pronto para mi gusto».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, gözlerini bir anlığına kapayıp tatmin olmuşça gülüyor.{/n} "Olması gerektiği gibi. Kurban sayısını sabit tutmaya bakın. Stokları biraz çabuk bitirebilirim."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai closes his eyes for a moment and chuckles in satisfaction.{/n} "As it should be. See to it that I never have a shortage of prey — I tend to run out too quickly for my liking."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai gözlerini bir anlığına kapıyor ve tatmin olmuş bir şekilde gülüyor.{/n} "Olması gerektiği gibi. Av sayısı konusunda sıkıntı yaşamayacağımdan emin ol, stokları biraz hızlı bitirme eğilimindeyimdir."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC
